Products.title: Bvlgari Bvlgari Watch

producttab.title: Specifications
producttab.subtitle: Product Specifications
producttab.paragraph1: Since the first generation models launched in 1998, the Bvlgari Aluminium watch has redefined the potential of luxury sports watches.
producttab.content: Serpenti Seduttori watch with 18K rose gold case and bracelet, 18K rose gold bezel set with diamonds and silver-white opaline dial Life in gold: with the Serpenti Seduttori watch, time becomes even more precious. Revisiting Bvlgari’s undisputed icon of seduction in a new design, the iconic teardrop-shaped head watch, thinner than ever, is enhanced by a sensual, extremely supple bracelet adorned with a hexagonal scale motif.

Products.title: Octo Finissimo Watch

producttab.title: Specifications
producttab.subtitle: Product Specifications
producttab.paragraph1: Octo Finissimo Automatic watch in 18K yellow gold with satin-finished polished case and extra-thin mechanical manufacture movement (2.33 mm thick), automatic winding and blue lacquered dial. Water-resistant to 100 meters.

Products.title: Bvlgari Aluminum Smeraldo

producttab.title: Specifications
producttab.subtitle: Product Specifications
producttab.paragraph1: Bvlgari Aluminium Smeraldo watch with mechanical manufacture movement, automatic winding, chronograph, 40 mm aluminium case, dark green rubber bezel and strap and green dial.
producttab.content:
Bvlgari Aluminium Smeraldo watch with mechanical manufacture movement, automatic winding, chronograph,

40 mm aluminium case, dark green rubber bezel and strap and green dial. Water-resistant to 100 meters. Limited edition of 1,000 pieces.

producttab.title: Description
producttab.subtitle: Description for our store
producttab.paragraph1: Since the first generation models launched in 1998, the Bvlgari Aluminium watch has redefined the potential of luxury sports watches. Crafted from completely unexpected materials, today’s iconic timepieces share the same pioneering allure as the original, speaking a universal language that transcends gender, age, trends and eras. Clean yet striking, the Bvlgari

Products.description: From the moment it was launched, this creation naturally found its place in the very closed circle of exceptional watches spanning the ages. The double logo, inspired by the circular inscriptions on ancient Roman coins, still demonstrates Bvlgari's exceptional ability to blend tradition and modernity in timeless creations.

Products.title: Serpenti Tubogas Watch
Products.description: Marrying two of the most iconic emblems of Bvlgari design, the Serpenti Tubogas watch combines the sinuous allure of the serpent with the contemporary spirit of Tubogas technique.
